verses.text: Here the Pharisees and Sadducees came up, and, to test Jesus, requested him to show them some sign from the heavens.

But Jesus answered, “\+w In|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w evening|strong="G3798"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* ‘\+w It|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w will|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1096"\+w* fine \+w weather|strong="G2105"\+w*, \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w sky|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w as|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w red|strong="G4449"\+w* \+w as|strong="G1161"\+w* fire.’

Now the disciples had crossed to the opposite shore, and had forgotten to take any bread.
Presently Jesus said to them, “Take care and be on your guard against the leaven of the Pharisees and Sadducees.”
But the disciples began talking among themselves about their having brought no bread.

On noticing this, Jesus said, “\+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w talking|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w among|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w yourselves|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w about|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w being|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w short|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1722"\+w* bread, \+w you|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w little|strong="G3640"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G3640"\+w*?

Don’\+w t|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w you|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w yet|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w see|strong="G3539"\+w*, \+w nor|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w remember|strong="G3421"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w five|strong="G4002"\+w* loaves \+w for|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w five|strong="G4002"\+w* \+w thousand|strong="G4000"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w how|strong="G4214"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4214"\+w* \+w baskets|strong="G2894"\+w* \+w you|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w took|strong="G2983"\+w* away?

Then they understood that he had told them to be on their guard, not against the leaven of bread, but against the teaching of the Pharisees and Sadducees.

On coming into the region of Caesarea Philippi, Jesus asked his disciples this question – “\+w Who|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w do|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w people|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w Man|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w*?”
“Some say John the Baptist,” they answered, “Others, however, say that he is Elijah, while others again say Jeremiah, or one of the prophets.”

“\+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*,”he said, “\+w who|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w do|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w*?”
To this Simon Peter answered, “You are the Christ, the Son of the living God.”

“\+w Blessed|strong="G3107"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w*, \+w Simon|strong="G4613"\+w*, Son \+w of|strong="G2532"\+w* Jonah,”Jesus replied. “\+w For|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w human|strong="G4561"\+w* \+w being|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w has|strong="G3962"\+w* revealed \+w this|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*.

Then he charged his disciples not to tell anyone that he was the Christ.

At that time Jesus Christ began to explain to his disciples that he must go to Jerusalem, and undergo much suffering at the hands of the elders, and chief priests, and teachers of the Law, and be put to death, and rise on the third day.
But Peter took Jesus aside, and began to rebuke him. “Master,” he said, “please God that will never be your fate!”

Jesus, however, turning to Peter, said, “\+w Out|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w way|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w*! \+w You|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1510"\+w* hindrance \+w to|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3754"\+w* look \+w at|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w things|strong="G3588"\+w*, \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w as|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w does|strong="G1510"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w as|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1510"\+w* person \+w does|strong="G1510"\+w*.”
